"DAMN THE STUPID OLSEN TWINS AND THEIR STUPID MOVIE!>:o xanga updated 3 down, 2 to go H0T K0H K0H: people are gonna get HEEELLA confused and think you have an infatuation with the o.t NO PEOPLE. NO. Those stupid brats have a movie" -my beloved seastar

I hate the way you talk to me, and the way you cut your hair; I hate the way you drive my car, I hate it when you stare. I hate your big dumb combat boots, And the way you read my mind. I hate you so much it makes me sick; It even makes me rhyme. I hate the way you're always right, I hate it when you lie, I hate it when you make me laugh; Even worse when you make me cry. I hate it that you're not around, And the fact that you didn't call. But mostly I hate the way I don't hate you; Not even close, not even a little bit, not even at all.

[8th graders] : this year was really fun and you guys made it that way. with your guys here i learned a LOT and i really mean it. i learned not to bicker about stupid crap that i'm not even going to care about the next week. i learned to look at the bright side of things. i'm just really gonna miss you guys. some of you guys i met this year, and i feel like i known you my entire life. people talk about how their friends made such an impact on themselves. now i know what they're talking about. this year was extremely hard for me for my own reasons and what you guys did for me meant a lot. i just can't believe that the entire year has gone by so quickly. now there's only about 6 days left and you're off to high school and i really don't want you guys to leave. i just want to be right next to you guys when you're in high school. i guess the reason why i'm so attached to you guys is that i see like a brother/sister figure in you guys. i hope you guys never change when you go to high school because i like you the way you are and i know that you guys are too smart to have high school get to your heads. well, i hope you guys have fun when you go off to high school and i'll see you PHHS people in a year and you Indy people, i wish you guys good luck and K.I.T! you know my sn. haha

hewoah! wow... this is new. oh well. me and LYNNA TANG are starting this together! ahha im so bored of 'effing xanga. everybody has one. hahaha. well anyways. today was kinda blech. hence the title. anyways. let's go down list shall we? B: we just ran the mile...i got 10:44.. yess i am so fucking slow ahha. C: we were talking about indulgences and Mr. Schmitt said that i got PUNK'D pshhh.... [BREAK] nuttin much handed out my mosaic stars :) D: language arts. you know. that art of language. E: planned our potluck for tomorrow during foist lunch. F: took down mile times and listened to `N SYNC !!! [2ND LUNCH] ate a bean cheese burrito and and italian ice in the gym and helping with 8th grade dance decorations. [pst! it's HELLLLLA pretty! :)] A: sorted things out for cremer and then she let me go to the gym to help the decorations and then.... [after school] i stayed until 3 and i played my `N SYNC CD hella loud on the stereo!~ haha. bought a TWIX. yum. well im outtie so toodles noodles!
